meta_title: Dr. Nithin KR | Orthopedic Surgeon in Shivamogga
meta_description: Expert orthopedic care by Dr. Nithin KR, MS Orthopedics. Specializing in trauma, sports injuries, spine care, and arthritis treatment at Max Multi Speciality Hospital, Shivamogga.
hero_floating_text: Rapid trauma response and immediate orthopedic care.
about_title: A compassionate approach to orthopedic excellence
about_body: Dr. Nithin KR is a highly skilled Orthopedic Surgeon dedicated to comprehensive musculoskeletal care. With expertise in trauma, sports medicine, and joint disorders, he blends advanced medical knowledge with empathy to help patients return to active, pain-free lives.
about_quote: Every patient deserves personalized care. I believe in treating the person, not just the condition.
about_highlight: Specialist in trauma, sports injuries, and joint preservation.
services_title: Focused care for every stage of recovery
services_body: From acute trauma to long-term joint management, every treatment plan is designed around mobility, strength, and confidence.
service_trauma_desc: Expert care for fractures, joint dislocations, and emergency orthopedic injuries with focus on optimal recovery.
service_spine_desc: Comprehensive treatment for neck pain and lower back pain using both conservative and advanced techniques.
service_arthritis_desc: Personalized solutions for multiple joint pain and arthritis to improve mobility and quality of life.
service_sports_desc: Specialized treatment for sports-related injuries with focus on getting athletes back to peak performance.
credentials_body: Recognized for clinical excellence and committed to continuous learning.
